Uses of Interface
org.apache.log4j.rolling.TriggeringPolicy

Packages that use TriggeringPolicy
org.apache.log4j.rolling Implements various file rolling policies. 
 

Uses of TriggeringPolicy in org.apache.log4j.rolling
 

Classes in org.apache.log4j.rolling that implement TriggeringPolicy
 class CompositeTriggeringPolicy
          CompositeTriggeringPolicy determines if rolling should be triggered by evaluating the current event against a set of triggering policies.
 class FilterBasedTriggeringPolicy
          FilterBasedTriggeringPolicy determines if rolling should be triggered by evaluating the current message against a set of filters.
 class SizeBasedTriggeringPolicy
          SizeBasedTriggeringPolicy looks at size of the file being currently written to.
 class TimeBasedRollingPolicy
          TimeBasedRollingPolicy is both easy to configure and quite powerful.
 

Methods in org.apache.log4j.rolling that return TriggeringPolicy
 TriggeringPolicy RollingFileAppender.getTriggeringPolicy()
          Get triggering policy.
 

Methods in org.apache.log4j.rolling with parameters of type TriggeringPolicy
 void CompositeTriggeringPolicy.addTriggeringPolicy(TriggeringPolicy policy)
          Add triggering policy
 void RollingFileAppender.setTriggeringPolicy(TriggeringPolicy policy)
          Set triggering policy.
